name: Thunder Hoop
storyline: Get involved in the awesome and great fun Thunder Hoop by entering the world and taking on the might of the evil Dr. GenBrain! Help your angry-looking and powerful character as you battle through the hordes of enemies, big and small to defeat the nasty Dr. GenBrain and restore peace to your futuristic world, one level at a time! Jump hazards, climb ladders and launch deadly attacks in the awesome Thunder Hoop.
summary: Thunder Hoop is a 2D side-scrolling platform game that puts players in the shoes of Thunder Hoop. Thunder Hoop has to stop the uncontrollable creatures professor Genbreak has released into to the world. Genbreak was forbidden to continue his dangerous research in creating these creatures, but exasperated, he created them all the same. Thunder Hoop was specifically developed in a laboratory to counter these creatures.
